choices.name: DX_HairyCellLeukemia
choices.choiceText: Hairy Cell Leukemia

choices.name: DX_MantleCellLymphoma
choices.choiceText: Mantle Cell Lymphoma

choices.name: DX_NoCancer_Leukemia
choices.choiceText: No Cancer or Leukemia Diagnosis

choices.name: DX_SmallLymphocyticLymphoma
choices.choiceText: Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma (SLL)

choices.name: RU_DeathOustideOfAcceptableTimeFrame
choices.choiceText: Death cases: Outside of acceptable timeframe

value.stringValue: Death cases: Outside of acceptable timeframe

choices.name: RU_Diagnosed2000_2013DeathWithin2Years
choices.choiceText: Death cases: Diagnosed between 2000-2013 with death occurring within 2 years

value.stringValue: Death cases: Diagnosed between 2000-2013 with death occurring within 2 years

choices.name: RU_DiagnosedPost2014DeathAfter2024
choices.choiceText: Death cases: Diagnosed after 2014 with death occurring after 2024

value.stringValue: Death cases: Diagnosed after 2014 with death occurring after 2024

choices.name: RU_Recurrence_Post_2004
choices.choiceText: Living case prior to 2000 BUT they had a recurrence post 2000

value.stringValue: Living case prior to 2000 BUT they had a recurrence post 2000

constants.description: This is the turn down details for when the caller did not give consent.
constants.name: NoConsentDQDetails

value.stringValue: The caller did not give consent to receive automated communications
Were you or your loved one diagnosed with any of the following conditions?

decisions.description: This will check to see if we don't have consent from the caller and need to DQ based on that fact and will update the turndown reason/details
decisions.name: UpdateTurndownInfo
decisions.label: UpdateTurndownInfo

Flow.description: AV- 6/24: Fixed the "fx_Phone_To_Case_Type", it was missing the five9 DNIS for PFAS so the case type wasn't automatically getting filled out. I added it to the formula so that it auto fills with the case type. AV - 6/24: Added the new acceptable diagnoses for PFAS- "Thyroid Disease" and "Ulcerative Colitis" to the screen element and to "fx_PFAS_Question1" that prints that screen's dx selection. RE - 5/23: Fixed mapping issue with Questions for all other case types. RE - 5/23: Fixed mapping issue with Questions PFAS. RE - 5/23: Mapping Answers and Questions for PFAS VP - 2305-2025 - PFAS Tiering VP - 07052025 - Added PFAS questions VP - 04232025 - Updated the RU values for diagnosis date from 2004 to 2000 CS - 04022025 - Updates to Round Up Questions Screen and related formulas. Works with inbound call center features to help guide agents create records for inbound calls. | Depo Updates 1/10/25 | 'Ringa' field change fix 1/11 | Turn Down Details/Reason Updates - Assign CaseType from DNIS # 1/13/25 | Added Eaton Case 2/3/25 | Added Inbound Disclaimer DQ Script | Added DQ for no Consent and move to 'Working' Status in the beginning | Added new inbound consent script with a tweak requested by intake management

dynamicChoiceSets.description: pulled from the talk question1 field that provides a list of diagnosis.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Talc_Diagnosis_Choices

formulas.description: Assigns a diagnosis value from the yes or no selection
formulas.name: fx_Depo_Diagnosis
formulas.expression: IF( {!Depo_diagnosed_with_a_meningioma} = "Yes", "Meningioma", "None of the Above")

formulas.name: fx_Depo_DQ_Details
formulas.expression: IF({!Depo_Provera_4_Use} <> "Yes", "Did not have enough exposure to product", IF({!Depo_diagnosed_with_a_meningioma} <> "Meningioma", "Did not have Meningioma", IF({!Depo_Legal_Representation} <> "No", "Already has legal representation", "" )))

formulas.name: fx_Depo_DQ_Reason
formulas.expression: IF({!Depo_Provera_4_Use} <> "Yes", "Not enough exposure to the product", IF({!Depo_diagnosed_with_a_meningioma} <> "Meningioma", "No formal diagnosis we accept", IF({!Depo_Legal_Representation} <> "No", "Already represented", "" )))

formulas.name: fx_Depo_Question3_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!Depo_diagnosed_with_a_meningioma} = "Meningioma", "Yes", "No")

formulas.description: Uses part1 formula to calculate numerical values and then assign appropriate Tiers
formulas.name: fx_Depo_Tier_Score_Final
formulas.expression: IF( AND({!Depo_Provera_4_Use} = "Yes", {!Depo_diagnosed_with_a_meningioma} = "Meningioma", {!Depo_Legal_Representation} = "No" ) , "Tier 1" ,"Tier 4")

formulas.name: fx_Depo_Tier_Score_Part1
formulas.expression: CASE({!Depo_Provera_4_Use}, "Yes", 1, "No", -1, 0) + CASE({!Depo_diagnosed_with_a_meningioma}, "Yes", 1, "No", -1, 0) + CASE({!Depo_Legal_Representation}, "Yes", -1, "No", 1, 0)

formulas.name: fx_LAWildfires_DQ_Details
formulas.expression: IF({!LAwildfire_TieringQuestion_HowWereYouAffected} = "None of the Above", "No accepted injury or property damage provided", IF({!LAW_Tiering_FireAffectedBy} <> "Eaton" && {!LAW_Tiering_FireAffectedBy} <> "Palisades", "Not inside the accepted boundries of Wildfire", IF({!LAW_Tier_HomeOrPropertyDamaged} = "Other", "Damage did not occur to property they own or rented", IF({!LAWildfires_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", "Already has legal representation", "" ))))

formulas.name: fx_LAWildfires_DQ_Reason
formulas.expression: IF({!LAwildfire_TieringQuestion_HowWereYouAffected} = "None of the Above", "Insufficient damages", IF({!LAW_Tiering_FireAffectedBy} <> "Eaton" && {!LAW_Tiering_FireAffectedBy} <> "Palisades", "Wrong location", IF({!LAW_Tier_HomeOrPropertyDamaged} = "Other", "Insufficient damages", IF({!LAWildfires_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", "Already Represented", "" ))))

formulas.name: fx_LAWildfires_Tiering
formulas.expression: IF({!LAwildfire_TieringQuestion_HowWereYouAffected} = "None of the Above", "Tier 4", IF({!LAW_Tiering_FireAffectedBy} <> "Eaton" && {!LAW_Tiering_FireAffectedBy} <> "Palisades", "Tier 4", IF({!LAW_Tier_HomeOrPropertyDamaged} = "Other", "Tier 4", IF({!LAWildfires_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", "Tier 4", "Tier 1" ))))

formulas.name: fx_NEC_DQ_Details
formulas.expression: IF({!NEC_Week_of_Birth} = "38+", "Not a premature birth", IF({!NEC_Given_Formula_Before_Diagnosed} <> "Post Formula", "Diagnosed before receiving formula", IF({!NEC_Diagnosed_with_NEC} <> "Necrotizing Enterocolitis", "Doesn't have diagnosis of Necrotizing Enterocolitis", IF( YEAR({!NEC_Childs_Date_of_Birth}) < 2001, "Child not born in accepted time frame", IF({!NEC_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", "Already has legal representation", "" )))))

formulas.name: fx_NEC_DQ_Reason
formulas.expression: IF({!NEC_Week_of_Birth} = "38+", "Questionable/No liability", IF({!NEC_Given_Formula_Before_Diagnosed} <> "Post Formula", "Questionable/No liability", IF({!NEC_Diagnosed_with_NEC} <> "Necrotizing Enterocolitis", "No formal diagnosis we accept", IF( YEAR({!NEC_Childs_Date_of_Birth}) < 2001, "Outside of Accepted Time Frame", IF({!NEC_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", "Already represented", "" )))))

formulas.description: translates the responses into marketing accepted answers
formulas.name: fx_NEC_Question2_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!NEC_Given_Formula_Before_Diagnosed} = "Prior to Formula", "No", "Yes")

formulas.description: provides marketing accepted answers for the question.
formulas.name: fx_NEC_Question3_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!NEC_Week_of_Birth} = "38+", "38+ weeks", "before 38 weeks")

formulas.name: fx_NEC_Question5_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF(YEAR({!NEC_Childs_Date_of_Birth}) < 2002, "Before 2002", "2002-2024")

formulas.name: fx_NEC_Tiering
formulas.expression: IF( AND({!NEC_Week_of_Birth} <> "38+", {!NEC_Given_Formula_Before_Diagnosed} = "Post Formula", {!NEC_Diagnosed_with_NEC} = "Necrotizing Enterocolitis", YEAR({!NEC_Childs_Date_of_Birth}) > 2001, {!NEC_Legal_Representation} = "No"), "Tier 1", "Tier 4")

formulas.name: fx_Paraquat_DQ_Details
formulas.expression: IF( {!Paraquat_exposed_to_Paraquat} <> "Direct Contact", "Never had direct exposure", IF( {!Paraquat_suffer_from_Parkinson} <> "Parkinson's", "Did not receive accepted Parkinson's diagnosis", IF( {!Paraquat_Legal_Representation} <> "No" , "Already represented by firm", "" )))

formulas.name: fx_Paraquat_DQ_Reason
formulas.expression: IF( {!Paraquat_exposed_to_Paraquat} <> "Direct Contact", "Not enough exposure to the product", IF( {!Paraquat_suffer_from_Parkinson} <> "Parkinson's", "No formal diagnosis we accept", IF( {!Paraquat_Legal_Representation} <> "No" , "Already represented", "" )))

formulas.name: fx_Paraquat_Tiering
formulas.expression: IF( AND( {!Paraquat_exposed_to_Paraquat} = "Direct Contact", {!Paraquat_suffer_from_Parkinson} = "Parkinson's", {!Paraquat_Legal_Representation} = "No" ), "Tier 1", "Tier 4")

formulas.name: fx_PFAS_DQ_Details
formulas.expression: IF( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "None of the Above", "No formal diagnosis we accept", IF( YEAR({!In_what_year_were_you_or_your_loved_one_diagnose}) < 2005, "Outside of acceptable timeframe", IF( {!Did_you_or_a_loved_one_live_in_a_PFAS_contaminated_area_for_over_1_year} = "No", "Not enough exposure to the product", IF( {!Have_you_previously_signed_documents_either_physically_or_electronically_regardi} = "Yes", "Already represented", "" ) ) ) )

formulas.name: fx_PFAS_DQ_Reasons
formulas.expression: IF( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "None of the Above", "No formal diagnosis we accept", IF( YEAR({!In_what_year_were_you_or_your_loved_one_diagnose}) < 2005, "Outside of acceptable timeframe", IF( {!Did_you_or_a_loved_one_live_in_a_PFAS_contaminated_area_for_over_1_year} = "No", "Not enough exposure to the product", IF( {!Have_you_previously_signed_documents_either_physically_or_electronically_regardi} = "Yes", "Already represented", "" ) ) ) )

formulas.name: fx_PFAS_Question1
formulas.expression: IF( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "Kidney Cancer", "Kidney Cancer", IF( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "Testicular Cancer", "Testicular Cancer", IF( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "Death by Cancer", "Death by Cancer", IF( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "Thyroid Disease", "Thyroid Disease", IF( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "Ulcerative Colitis", "Ulcerative Colitis", "None of the Above" ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: fx_PFAS_Question2
formulas.expression: IF(YEAR({!In_what_year_were_you_or_your_loved_one_diagnose}) < 2005, "Before 2005", "After 2005")

formulas.name: fx_PFAS_Question3
formulas.expression: IF( {!Did_you_or_a_loved_one_live_in_a_PFAS_contaminated_area_for_over_1_year} = "Yes", "Yes", "No" )

formulas.name: fx_PFASTier
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!What_illness_were_you_formally_diagnosed_with_by_a_medical_professional} = "None of the Above", YEAR({!In_what_year_were_you_or_your_loved_one_diagnose}) < 2005, {!Did_you_or_a_loved_one_live_in_a_PFAS_contaminated_area_for_over_1_year} = "No", {!Have_you_previously_signed_documents_either_physically_or_electronically_regardi} = "Yes" ), "Tier 4", "Tier 1" )

formulas.name: fx_Phone_To_Case_Type
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '3725'), 'a03UJ000003vZnKYAU', IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '3474'), 'a03Dn0000054CCKIA2', IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '2462'), 'a03UJ00000Nx22KYAR', IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '4479'), 'a03UJ000003vZnMYAU', IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '4511'), 'a03UJ000003vZnLYAU', IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '0882'), 'a03UJ000003vZnNYAU', IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '1927'), 'a03UJ00000bHU2nYAG', IF(CONTAINS({!Get_Intake.five9DNIS__c}, '3416'), 'a03UJ00000SEzjSYAT', "" ))))))))

formulas.name: fx_PQ_Question1_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!Paraquat_exposed_to_Paraquat} = "Direct Contact", "Yes", "No" )

formulas.name: fx_PQ_Question2_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!Paraquat_suffer_from_Parkinson} = "Parkinson's", "Yes, diagnosed with parkinson's", "No" )

formulas.description: timeframe conversion to accepted value on the backend from question answered.
formulas.name: fx_RoundUp_Diagnosis_Timeframe
formulas.expression: IF( {!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed} = "Before 2004", "Living case before 2004", "Living case between 2004-current")

formulas.name: fx_RoundUp_DQ_Details
formulas.expression: IF( {!RoundUp_develop_any_symptoms} = "None of the Above", "Does not have acceptable diagnosis", IF( {!RoundUp_you_or_a_loved_one_directly_exposed} = "Indirect Contact", "Never had direct contact with product", IF( CONTAINS({!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed}, "before"), "Was not diagnosed in accepted time frame", IF( CONTAINS({!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed}, "Outside of acceptable timeframe"), "Was not diagnosed in accepted time frame", IF( {!RoundUp_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", "Already represented by a firm", "" ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: fx_RoundUp_DQ_Reason
formulas.expression: IF( {!RoundUp_develop_any_symptoms} = "None of the Above", "No formal diagnosis we accept", IF( {!RoundUp_you_or_a_loved_one_directly_exposed} = "Indirect Contact", "Not enough exposure to the product", IF( CONTAINS({!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed}, "before"), "Outside of Accepted Time Frame", IF( CONTAINS({!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed}, "Outside of acceptable timeframe"), "Outside of Accepted Time Frame", IF( {!RoundUp_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", "Already represented", "" ) ) ) ) )

formulas.description: provide picklist values for yes or no question.
formulas.name: fx_RoundUp_Exposure_Type
formulas.expression: IF({!RoundUp_you_or_a_loved_one_directly_exposed} = "Yes", "Direct Contact", "Indirect Contact")

formulas.name: fx_RoundUpTier
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!RoundUp_develop_any_symptoms} = "None of the Above", {!RoundUp_you_or_a_loved_one_directly_exposed} = "Indirect Contact", CONTAINS({!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed}, "before"), CONTAINS({!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed}, "Outside of acceptable timeframe"), {!RoundUp_Legal_Representation} = "Yes" ), "Tier 4", "Tier 1" )

formulas.name: fx_RU_Question1_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!RoundUp_develop_any_symptoms} = "Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma (NHL)", "Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma (NHL)", "No cancer or Leukemia Diagnosis")

formulas.name: fx_RU_Question2_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!RoundUp_you_or_a_loved_one_directly_exposed} = "Direct Contact", "Yes", "No")

formulas.name: fx_RU_Question3_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!RoundUp_What_year_were_you_or_a_loved_one_diagnosed}, "before"), "Before 2004", "2004 or After")

formulas.name: fx_Talc_DQ_Details
fx_Talc_DQ_Reason
fx_Talc_Question1_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: CASE({!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer}, "Mesothelioma (women only)", "Mesothelioma", "Primary Peritoneal", "Peritoneal Cancer", "Fallopian Tube Cancer", "Fallopian Tube Cancer", "Ovarian Cancer", "Ovarian Cancer", "None of the above", "No", "Others")

formulas.name: fx_Talc_Question2_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF(YEAR({!Talcum_Date_of_Diagnosis}) > 2019, "2020 or After", "2019 or Before")

formulas.description: formula to provide tiering for Talcum
formulas.name: fx_TalcTier
formulas.expression: IF( AND(OR({!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Mesothelioma (women only)", {!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Primary Peritoneal", {!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Fallopian Tube Cancer", {!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Ovarian Cancer" ), YEAR({!Talcum_Date_of_Diagnosis}) > 2019, {!Talc_Legal_Representation} = "No" ), "Tier 1", IF( AND( {!Talc_Legal_Representation} = "Yes", OR({!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Mesothelioma (women only)", {!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Primary Peritoneal", {!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Fallopian Tube Cancer", {!Talc_Did_You_Have_Cancer} = "Ovarian Cancer"), YEAR({!Talcum_Date_of_Diagnosis}) > 2019 ), "Tier 2", "Tier 4" ))

formulas.description: translates answers from first question into acceptable values for marketing.
formulas.name: NEC_Question1_MarketingTranslation
formulas.expression: IF({!NEC_Diagnosed_with_NEC} = "Necrotizing Enterocolitis", "Yes", "No")

fields.name: Unrecognized_Case_Type_TEXT
fields.fieldText: The Case Type that was selected is not recognized as a current Campaign, please go back and select again or notify your PD Team and Manager.

fields.name: Depo_Question_Display
fields.fieldText:
Depo-Provera Tiering Questions

These answers will populate on the main questionnaire

fields.name: Depo_Provera_4_Use
fields.fieldText: Did you use Depo-Provera for one year or more?

fields.name: Depo_diagnosed_with_a_meningioma
fields.fieldText: Have you been diagnosed with a meningioma?

fields.name: Depo_Legal_Representation
fields.fieldText: Have you previously signed documents, either physically or electronically, regarding this particular matter with any other law firm?

fields.name: EndingDQ_DisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Tiering Questions are Complete and the intake has been Disqualified.

Please Read: Unfortunately, we cannot accept your potential case at this time. As such, we are not able to represent you and will not be filing a lawsuit on your behalf. This does not mean you dont have a case. Please consider contacting another law firm for a second opinion. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us at Saddle Rock Legal Group. Have a great day!


**Note to Agent: If the caller asked 'why', its okay to simply state that 'Theres a current lack of evidence to fit our case criteria.' No further details than that.

fields.name: Ending_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Tiering Questions Complete!

The screenflow is now complete. Please proceed to the questionnaire as usual. Thanks!

fields.name: Beginning_notification_Text
fields.fieldText:
Inbound Caller New Intake Tiering Questions

These questions are critical and help Marketing determine the leads tier. These must be asked before proceeding with the questionnaire.

fields.name: DisplayIntroScript1
fields.fieldText:
Intro Script READ

"Hello, thank you for calling! This is {!$User.FirstName} from [SRLG or LIA]. I am happy to assist you today, but to best help you I will just need to ask you a few quick questions to get started."

"May I please have your first name? And now may I please have your Last Name?"

"How may I assist you today?"

fields.name: Opening_Intro_Text
fields.fieldText: Update the clients name and information here

fields.name: May_I_please_have_your_first_name
fields.fieldText: May I please have your first name?

fields.name: May_I_please_have_your_last_name
fields.fieldText: May I please have your last name?

fields.name: Disclaimer_Script_Display
fields.fieldText:
Continue Reading

Hi {!May_I_please_have_your_first_name} {!May_I_please_have_your_last_name}, I have a few follow-up questions to see how we can help you with your potential {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name} case. Before we get started, I have a quick disclaimer to read Please be advised this call may be recorded for quality and training purposes, and the recording will be subject to third-party AI call analytics software. Additionally, your responses will be recorded exactly as you state them and reviewed by our staff and counsel. The information you provide is very important should you have a case. You may be asked to verify your responses by affidavit, so your complete honesty is crucial. Do you agree to provide accurate information to the best of your knowledge?"


Also, you agree to receive automated text notifications and phone calls by or on behalf of Saddle Rock to the number you are calling from regarding your potential case, please clearly say Yes. Your consent is not a condition of purchase.

fields.name: Internal_Do_they_agree_to_consent_to_the_above_terms
fields.fieldText: [Internal] Do they agree to consent to the above terms?

fields.name: DQ_Notifications_Consent
fields.fieldText:
I understand your concerns, {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.Name}. However, in order for us to proceed, we do need your consent to contact you. The attorneys may need to reach out from time to time with important updates or to ask questions regarding your case.

Without your consent, we wouldnt be able to move forward in assisting you. Would you be open to reconsidering so we can proceed?


(If they still refuse:)


UNFORTUNATELY THEY ARE DQ

I completely respect your decision. Unfortunately, without your consent to be contacted, we wont be able to move forward with your potential case. If you change your mind, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for your time here at Saddle Rock Legal Group!

fields.name: Case_Type_Confirmation
fields.fieldText: Please Confirm the case you are calling about. (if already filled out. "To confirm, this is the case you are calling for?")
